commentaries.bbcode: [b]Rohit:[/b] "We kept it simple. We are just taking it one game at a time and the two points was all that mattered tonight. It's very unusual to have rain at this time of year so we had to make some quick calculations but it was a very good partnership and Pollard finished it in the end. Harbhajan's spell was magical and we just need to keep moving forward now."

message.text: Rohit: "We kept it simple. We are just taking it one game at a time and the two points was all that mattered tonight. It's very unusual to have rain at this time of year so we had to make some quick calculations but it was a very good partnership and Pollard finished it in the end. Harbhajan's spell was magical and we just need to keep moving forward now."

tweetjson.text: That's why you can't switch it off. #MIvsDD #PepsiIPL

commentaries.bbcode: A huge win for Mumbai that leaves Delhi's playoff hopes hanging by a thread. Join us again later today (yes it's that late) as Kings XI travel to Bangalore to face RCB in another huge clash. Good morning from Mumbai!

message.text: A huge win for Mumbai that leaves Delhi's playoff hopes hanging by a thread. Join us again later today (yes it's that late) as Kings XI travel to Bangalore to face RCB in another huge clash. Good morning from Mumbai!
